column5: Based on the heated discussion in the other thread,  I am curious to see which side of the line the OFC community would fall if we could vote to either keep or eliminate the registry?  How would you vote?
looks like the thread was dusted.... it is now in the boneyard.   G
Keep the registry and stop the "Operators Card".
"looks like the thread was dusted.... it is now in the boneyard."   This one is also.... everyone knows what the majority thinks...EVERYONE.
